description.ko: 크리스탈 프리즘을 통해 선명한 스펙트럼으로 갈라지는 빛의 매혹적인 아름다움을 경험해 보세요. 미니멀한 미학과 색의 물리학이 조화를 이룹니다.
description.en: Experience the mesmerizing beauty of light as it splits into a vivid spectrum through a crystal prism, blending minimalist aesthetics with the physics of color.

prompt: A sophisticated macro shot of a triangular crystal prism positioned on a minimalist white surface. A single, focused beam of white light hits the glass, dispersing into a vibrant, sharp rainbow spectrum with elegant caustic light patterns. Soft lens flare, ethereal atmosphere, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, hyper-realistic textures.
